meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics used to treat tuberculosis and other bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed rifamycins to cure the bacterial infection in my lungs.
meanings.sent2: The rifamycins successfully treated the tuberculosis in the patient.
meanings.sent3: The rifamycins worked their magic on the harmful bacteria, like tiny warriors in a battle.
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was as swift as the rifamycins attacking the infection.
meanings.sent5: The rifamycins acted like a shield, protecting the body from the invading bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of various antibiotics derived from a strain of Streptomyces bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended rifamycins for the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: Streptomyces bacteria produce rifamycins, which are powerful antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The rifamycins from Streptomyces were like a gift from nature to fight infections.
meanings.sent4: The rifamycins were like tiny soldiers battling the bacteria in the body.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of rifamycins was a breakthrough in treating bacterial illnesses.
